question: Which country is to partner with Russia, in production and marketing of Sputnik V vaccine?
explanation:
Russia and Brazil have decided to cooperate in the production and marketing of Sputnik V, the worldâ€™s first registered coronavirus vaccine.
The Russian Direct Investment Fund (RIDF) announced that it has entered into the agreement with Brazilian State of Parana. RIDF is organising the production of the vaccine and its distribution in Brazil and other American countries.
